name: Castle Of The Dead VR
description:
Castle of the dead aims to be a VR First person horror game inspired by the classic arcade  shooter House of the dead, borrowing heavily from the arcade gameplay that made the  original so fun, taking place in an abandoned castle where 13th century zombies are roaming  the cramped dimly lit corridors, the player must navigate this environment with their variety of  ranged weaponry borrowing elements to create new and unique ranged weapons. There is  an emphasises of claustrophobic environments with a chase mechanic that is always  pushing the player forward. All of this then leads to a multitude of different bosses and  unique encounters that provide new and unique ways to play/interact with the game.
